mapper.select: select * from FutureDiaryComment where futureDiaryId = #{param1} and commentId is null order by regDate asc
select * from FutureDiaryComment where commentId = #{param1} order by regDate asc
select count(id) from FutureDiaryComment where futureDiaryId = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into FutureDiaryComment (content, memberId, futureDiaryId , commentId) values(#{content},#{memberId},#{futureDiaryId},#{commentId});
mapper.update: update FutureDiaryComment set content = #{content} where id=#{id}
